meanings.definition: A rare complex oxide mineral with the formula (Ca,Na,Pb,Sr)2(Sn,Ti,Zr)2(Nb,Ta)2O6(OH,F).
meanings.english_definition: A rare complex oxide mineral with the formula (Ca,Na,Pb,Sr)2(Sn,Ti,Zr)2(Nb,Ta)2O6(OH,F).

examples.sentence: The djalmaite was found in association with other rare minerals.
examples.translation: そのdjalmaiteは、他の希少鉱物と共に見つかりました。

etymology.value: Named after Djalma Guimarães (1894–1973), a Brazilian mineralogist.
